change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 2/2021, effective January 8, 2021.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Exemption from limitation on extension of certificate
bcl:section.bcl:text: Section 31 (4) (a) of the Environmental Assessment Act, as it limits the number of times that a deadline specified in an environmental assessment certificate may be extended, does not apply in relation to the reviewable project described in Environmental Assessment Certificate # M09-02 if the deadline is not extended beyond January 14, 2021.
